title: Gh-sender
description:
SMS and whatsapp marketing platform, Send bulk SMS using your android mobile as an SMS gateway - Easily send messages to different groups of contacts. Get notifications when your messages are sent or received! - Schedule your SMS sends. 

Tools:
- Add Contacts
- Add Group
- Import Contacts (Excel file)
- Created Webhook
- Send USSD Request
- Add Hook Action
- Add Reply Action
- Add SMS Template
